author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Enter an instruction and watch the API respond with a completion that attempts to match the context or pattern you provided.
commands.name: openai-completions

commands.description: Check email body for possible security issues. It is possible to keep asking questions on the provided info using 'gpt-send-message'. Resets conversation context by default.
commands.name: gpt-check-email-body

commands.description: Send a plain message to the selected GPT model and receive the generated response.
commands.name: gpt-send-message

commands.description: Checking email header for possible security issues. It is possible to keep asking questions on the provided info using 'gpt-send-message'. Resets conversation context by default.
commands.name: gpt-check-email-header

commands.description: Create an email template out of the conversation context to be sent from the SOC.
commands.name: gpt-create-soc-email-template

integration.description: Designed to assist security professionals with security investigations, threat hunting, and anomaly detection, leveraging OpenAI GPT models' natural language conversational capabilities.
integration.name: OpenAI GPT

description: The OpenAI API can be applied to virtually any task that involves understanding or generating natural language or code.
name: OpenAI
readme:
